entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -36.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -39.8°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
